text:
[Verse]
Sunny skies above
Warm breeze in the air
Laughing through the park
No worries no cares

[Verse 2]
Ice cream in my hand
Sand beneath my toes
Splashing in the waves
That's just how it goes

[Chorus]
Oh summer daydream
Floating on a cloud
In this golden gleam
Singing out loud

[Verse 3]
Colors in the sky
Kites up high they soar
Friends all by my side
Can't ask for more

[Bridge]
Sunsets paint the sea
Stars begin to shine
In this reverie
All the world's divine

[Verse 4]
Dancing with the dusk
Fireflies alight
Trust in this moment
Everything's so right
title: Summer Daydream
